text: Fhe Bakɨmen ŋkasŋka Efesusan hɨgap, khaŋ tɨgap ŋgari. Ana ŋgarav Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar Por ga rugap ana ndɨkndɨga khavgiap, ndɨkndɨgar ana ndɨɨim, ana khaŋ nzuai, “Gu fharav Masedonia fhain ŋgɨgɨp, ŋgɨp, Akaia fhain ŋgɨgɨp, gu zumgum Zerusareman naanga. Gu ŋgɨp, mba fhaiŋ gangip, gu vhɨra zumgum ŋgɨp, Rom gangirga.”
